value.title: How to generate SSH public key to log into Linux VM | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to generate SSH public keys to log into a Linux VM with Cloud Shell and BASH on Windows 10. Watch how you can automatically log into a VM without having to put in a password if you SSH into the server.  For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/16bUZ43CGxs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to host a static website with Azure Storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how you can host a static website running in Azure Storage in a few steps.     For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gYpNC_tdbQQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to pin content to your Azure portal dashboard | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this episode of the #Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to pin content on the portal for easier access and monitoring. We'll go over how to choose a dashboard to pin to and the differences between a private and a shared dashboard.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eyOJkhYItSg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Azure Automation with PowerShell | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Automation with a Windows Machine with PowerShell. Azure Automation makes it easy to do common tasks like, scaling Azure SQL Database up and down and starting and stopping a virtual machine.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pQ9dQ13B2vM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Implement serverless APIs with Azure Functions and Azure API Management | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can quickly deploy and manage your Serverless API's using OpenAPI and API Management.  0:00 – Overview 0:40 – OpenAPI definition (fka Swagger) 2:15 – Using API Management to build an OpenAPI definition 3:48 – Reviewing the generated OpenAPI definition
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4fPRxveXGXw" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: The difference between, ID, access, refresh, and session tokens? | One Dev Question: Hirsch Singhal
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Hirsch Singhal a Program Manager working on the Microsoft identity platform, explains the difference between identity, access, refresh, and session tokens.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/access-tokens?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-AzureIdent
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/41vmzPdbfXM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines? Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how ACR can manage your images and even build them for you in the cloud.   0:00 – Overview

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build and query a Delta Lake
value.excerpt: Build and query a Delta Lake

value.title: Capture and view page load times in your Azure web app with Application Insights
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll configure Application Insights and use it to study page load data for an Azure web app.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
value.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.
